name: makestack
description: A Heroku app.json for MakeStack Server.

MAILER_SENDER.description: The mail address sent from the server. (e.g., noreply@foo.herokuapp.com)

RECAPTCHA_SECRET.description: A Google reCAPTCHA secret key. (get one from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin)

RECAPTCHA_SITEKEY.description: A Google reCAPTCHA site secret key.

SMTP_HOST.description: A SMTP server hostname. (you can use SendGrid for free if you don't have one)

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: A SMTP server user name. (set an API key if you want to use SendGrid)

GENERATE_CONFIG_FROM_ENV.description: Generate config files during deployment. Leave this parameter alone.

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: A description in the top page.
WELCOME_MESSAGE.value: This is a demonstration place to play with MakeStack.
